// \u65B9\u6CD51
for(let i = 1; i <= 5;i++){
	setTimeout(function timer(){
		console.log(i)
	}, i * 1000)
}

// \u65B9\u6CD52
for(var i = 1; i <= 5;i++){
	(function(){
		// j \u5728 \u7ACB\u5373\u6267\u884C\u51FD\u6570 \u521B\u5EFA\u7684 \u65B0\u7684\u4F5C\u7528\u57DF\u4E2D
		var j = i;
		setTimeout(function timer(){
			console.log(j)
		}, j * 1000)
	})()
}
